metadata.title: CVE-2019-9085 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Hoteldruid before v2.3.1 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (invoice-creation outage) via the n_file parameter to visualizza_contratto.php with invalid arguments (any non-numeric value), as demonstrated by the anno=2019&id_transazione=1&numero_contratto=1&n_file=a query string to visualizza_contratto.php.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.2-1').
